p: As expected, a greater significant positive correlation was noticed between NR and BVFP values (0.92, p < 0.0001), as well as between NR and NPU (0.999, p < 0.001). Regarding the correlation between NR and PUN, we noticed a significant correlation (0.54, p < 0.001). The plasma creatinine concentration decreased 11.36% in the LEW group compared to the SM group ( p < 0.05).
